main.name: Venkateswara Rao G
main.description: I am a Technology Lead, currently employed by Tata Consultancy Services (TCS) where I push pixels, shuffle data, and slap my keyboard until everything works
main.bio: I work as a Software Engineer for TCS, alongside my many ongoing projects. I love to create and tend to keep a few too many projects on the go at a time. I love to travel and lead a fairly nomadic lifestyle.

education.description: I took my Bachelors of Electronics & Communication Engineering Specialty and achieved a much more thorough education in the underlying theory, concepts, and science behind more complex programming. It was here that I discovered my passion for scalable application programming (web and mobile), the security behind computer and application systems, and found that I have a knack for understanding complex algorithms..

work.title: Technology Lead
work.description: Over 9+ years of IT experience which includes 5+ years of Extensive experience as a React JS Developer and 5 years of Experience as a SharePoint Developer.Extensive experience in developing web pages using HTML/HTML5, XML, DHTML CSS/CSS3,JavaScript, React JS, Redux, Flex, Angular JS (1.X) JQuery, JSON, Node.js,, Ajax, JQUERY Bootstrap, SharePoint Online, 2013/2010/2007, REST, SPServices,JSON,CSOM,Nintex,Infopath Forms,Power BI, Power Apps, Metalogix, ShareGate, PowerShell

work.title: Software Engineer
work.description: SharePoint Developer with 5 years of experience developing and implementing SharePoint-based solutions. Strong ability to facilitate meetings with individuals and groups to gather, understand, and articulate their business needs. Mastery of web apps SharePoint-based third-party apps and SharePoint Designer.
